name: The Literal Embodiment of Pain
description:
This is Painformer, a 3D multiplayer parkour racing game made in Construct 3. Because it is made in Construct 3, a 2D engine, the game is very glitchy and semi-broken. Regardless, it is now here for you and your friends to enjoy (or not).
Leave a comment or something if you liked it, I guess.
